name: Pawn War
description:
PawnWar is a well known strategic board game in which you try to leave as less pawns as possible on the board. In order to do that you have to define your strategy right from the beginning and choose your moves carefully.
PawnWar is a must have game for all ages that you and your kids will enjoy playing for hours while practicing your mind at the same time.

FEATURES

-Many different boards to play
-Beautiful 3D gothic scenery
